subtitles.text: Hi, and welcome to Mia-Platform Video Pills.
In this video, we will show you Mia-Platform Bucket Storage.
Bucket Storage extends the functionality of Mia-Platform Fast Data and provides storage of raw data.

This data is ready to be re-injected when needed or can be served to business intelligence, relieving DB administration. To better understand how it works, we will only show you the microservices to be installed in a use case.
As you can see, we have already set up the Mia-Platform Fast Data projections with a ER Schema with these entries: customer, order, and product.
In addition, we already have a Single View called Order History.
Let's install the first microservice.
Go to the microservices section and search for the Ingestion Storage Service.
During installation, remember to set the correct environment variables, configuration maps and Secret Keys.
Letâ€™s deploy it We can now see that we have our empty bucket.
With Postman, we populate our bucket with the customer.
Now we can see that we have generated a new customer.
We now install the second microservice we need: Ingestion Reloader.
Find it on Mia-Platform marketplace and install it with all the configurations and secrets as we did before.
Expose the API and deploy it.
Now we can take a look at our use case.
In MongoDB, we already have some pre-filled data, topics already mentioned at the beginning of this video.
As you can see, we have a customer, some orders, a single view that aggregates the orders, a number of products and returning to the single view, within the orders we can see the products.
Let us switch to our bucket and see that we have folders for each topic.
For example, we can see the orders here.
Now we delete our orders and show how to reinject the same data from the bucket.
The order collection is now empty.
We also have no data in the Single View.
To reingest the data, we go to Postman.
We declare that we want to input order data.
Let's click on Send.
Now, going back to MongoDB, you can see again orders both in the topic and in the single view.

The main benefits of Bucket Storage include: providing large storage space at a reduced cost, becoming an easily accessible repository for backup and compliance reasons, enabling easy exposure of data to business intelligence tools.
Try it with Mia-Platform v11.
